title: New Client
body:
A Few days ago i have updated my old client to the new one and the desktop shortcut changed
Today deskstop shortcut got "destroyed" and when i double click it to open it automatically starts console for 1 sec then does nothing
Now i have old client shorcut it opens the patcher but it cant be upgraded again
It doesnt open the login screen what can i do please help

replies.body:
This sounds like a security setting that may either not have installed the update properly or had permissions to change the icons.  Start off with each step in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that League is allowed to make these changes and updates, making sure to double check any antivirus as well.

If the issue persists after going over the guide, download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) after access is restored and perform a reinstall to catch you up.  Let me know if that helps!
